page.title: 10Leisure in Durris.
page.content: In our area there are lots of things to do in your spare time.Things like go for walks,go paddling in the River Dee,go for day trips,go on a cycle run and lots more exciting things.Our family goes for walks with our dog a lot.we go picnics and we go cycle runs as well.People go fishing in the River Dee for trout and salmon.In the hall at Kirkton of Durris there is indoor bowling and the W.R.I and Young Farmers Club meet there.Next to the Kirkton Hall there is a rifle club. Sometimes people have to travel to do things.Me,my sister and my dad go to Banchory to run in the Amateur Athletics club.I go to Drumoak for the cubs.Some other boys from Woodlands go as well.For films and concerts you have to go to Aberdeen.Many people go in to watch Aberdeen F.C.which is a tremendous football team.
